name: Snowzooka
description:
Dr. Stupid has done it again.  He always tinkers with living being like toys, making them his own servants. This time we are talking about penguins that have had chips implanted into their brains in order to be controlled to be hostile towards people. Tanas is the only one that decided to take the Snowzooka into her own hands in order to subdue the penguins and stop Dr. Stupid once and for all!

     This game is made for the Black and White Jam #7 (https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-7), in collaboration with FlatWhiteCanvas (https://flatwhitecanvas.itch.io/)

Move : A, D

Jump: SPACE

Go Through Platforms: S + SPACE

Shoot: K
